snippet.title: Convoy Release Announcement
snippet.description:
We are very excited to let you know that Convoy will hit the shelves on Steam on Tuesday April 21st! After about a year and a half of development, and a succesful Kickstarter campaign, our game inspired by Mad Max and FTL is finally ready for release.

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/318230/
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1248554329/convoy-a-tactical-roguelike-like?ref=nav_search
Website: http://www.convoy-games.com
